metadata.description:
Embarking on a fresh chapter in the adidas web3 journey, we transcend the realms of Into the Metaverse into Phase 3: ALTS by adidas.

Update: Your ALTS by adidas NFT metadata has been updated with your ALT[er] Ego. [Learn more and check the utility](https://collect.adidas.com). [Terms and conditions](https://a.did.as/collect_tc).
metadata.name: ALTS by adidas #1
